summary: Adds the Dragonbone weapons from Dawnguard to leveled lists. Includes enchanted variants. Requires Dawnguard.
descriptionHtml:
In vanilla Dawnguard, the only way to get Dragonbone weapons is to craft them. This mod fixes that.

Adds the Dragonbone weapons from Dawnguard to the leveled lists, including enchanted versions.

Weapons will start appearing at level 50. Enchanted versions will start at 51, with better enchanted versions at higher levels.

You are advised to use a bashed patch if you use any other mods that affect leveled lists.

Requires Dawnguard.
author: AliTheLord
